Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Netherworld Lane, north of the Kaldeas Mansion.
Room.LongDescription: There is a strangely shaped mansion to the south of Netherworld Lane. A large banner reads "Kaldeas' Mansion of Illusion". There appears to be an entrance to the east on Netherworld Lane. On the north side of the road, there is a public storage facility. On a first-come, first-served basis, citizens may rent or use some of the storage locations in the complex. The entrance to the facility is to the north.
